summary: Each year, the Older Americans Act provides billions of dollars in grants for programs that help older people stay in their homes. And as the U.S. population ages, demand will likely increase for services like in-home meals, transportation, and caregiver support. We looked at fraud risk management in these programs administered by the Departments of Health and Human Services and Labor. Both agencies said the...
title: Older Americans Act: Agencies Should Take Steps to Better Manage Fraud Risks
